hypothesis: Active CMA-ES uses information from unsuccessful steps to improve covariance learning. May converge faster or more accurately.
result: ABORTED - Wrong premise. CMA_active is already True by default in pycma. Baseline already uses active CMA-ES.
key_findings: pycma's CMA_active option defaults to True
This means active covariance update is already enabled in baseline
No experiment needed - we're already using active CMA-ES
